siteMetadata.title: Jonathan Paynter | Undergraduate Electronic and Information Engineer
siteMetadata.description: 4th year undergraduate Electronic and Information Engineer at Imperial College London.
siteMetadata.about:
I am a 4th year undergraduate student studying Electronic and Information Engineering.
              Pre-lockdown my interests were hiking, running, climbing and swimming, all I hope to resume shortly.
              I am interested in all elements of AI, but specifically I'd like to continue in reinforcement learning, and AI in social science.
